jobs.title: Babysitter - Hammond, LA
jobs.description:
Are you a college student or recent grad looking for a flexible part-time job and great pay? Wyndy is a mobile app connecting families with trusted babysitters. Due to increasing demand, Wyndy needs qualified babysitters in Hammond.

What is Wyndy...

Wyndy is a mobile app that connects parents and babysitters in Hammond. With Wyndy, there's no guesswork in finding a well-paying, local sitting gig that fits your schedule.

Parents post jobs, and you simply choose the ones that are a good fit. You can get booked in a matter of minutes!

Perks of the job:

Get PAID well: Wyndys earn an average of $16+/hour and $75+ per job.
Work WHEN you want: Choose jobs that fit your schedule!
Work WHERE you want: You can work jobs anywhere Wyndy is available.
Have FUN on the job! Our families want for sitters ready to have fun and engage with their children.
EASY-to-use app: Find jobs, change your city, set job alerts, & track earnings, all in one place.
Requirements

Must be 18 years or older
Must have reliable transportation (public transit and rideshare acceptable)
Documentation: Driver license number, Social Security number, consent to a background check
1+ year childcare experience (paid babysitting, volunteering with churches or daycares, etc.)
Enrolled in accredited higher education institution OR have an undergraduate degree

Additional job details:

Job Type: Contract

Salary: $16.00 - $28.00 per hour

Schedule:

10 hour shift
12 hour shift
4 hour shift
8 hour shift
After school
Choose your own hours
Day shift
Evening shift
Night shift
No nights
No weekends
Overnight shift
Weekends as needed

Supplemental pay types:

Tips
Work Location: In person

jobProviders.jobProvider: Resource Hub For Southeastern Louisiana University Students | Uloop

jobs.title: Babysitter
jobs.description:
About Wyndy

Founded in 2017, Wyndy is a trusted platform connecting babysitters with families for reliable childcare. Our app ensures safety with insured jobs and guaranteed payment, offering flexible scheduling for sitters everywhere. Join our community to access quality childcare opportunities, ideal for students and recent grads seeking meaningful work...

Why Wyndy?

Wyndy is not just another babysitting app; we're a community founded on safety, reliability, and fun. With Wyndy, there's no need for self-promotion or navigating unreliable social media groups. Our platform offers a straightforward way to find safe, local babysitting jobs that pay well and fit your schedule

Perks of Working with Wyndy:
• Competitive Pay: Earn an average of $19+/hour.
• Flexible Scheduling: Choose jobs that align with your class schedule and free time.
• Work Locally: Find babysitting jobs in your preferred neighborhoods.
• Enjoy Your Work: Engage in fun activities and positively impact children's lives.
• Simplify Your Search: Our easy-to-use app lets you find jobs, set alerts, and track your earnings effortlessly.

Requirements:
• Must be at least 18 years old.
• Reliable transportation required (public transit and rideshare acceptable).
• Must provide documentation: Driver's license number, Social Security number, and consent to a background check.
• At least 1 year of childcare experience (paid babysitting, volunteering at churches or daycares, etc.).
• Currently enrolled in or a graduate of an accredited higher education institution.

Join Our Community

If you're passionate about childcare and looking for a flexible way to earn income while in school, Wyndy is the perfect platform for you. Become a part of a network that values your time and skills, offering access to numerous babysitting jobs that fit your life.

Apply now to start your journey with Wyndy, the most trusted babysitting platform, and turn your babysitting skills into a rewarding opportunity!

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $17.00 - $28.00 per hour

Benefits:
• Flexible schedule

Day range:
• Monday to Friday
• No weekends
• Weekends as needed

Shift:
• 10 hour shift
• 12 hour shift
• 4 hour shift
• 8 hour shift
• After school
• Day shift
• Evening shift
• Night shift
• No nights
• Overnight shift

Supplemental schedule:

Work Location: In person

jobs.title: Part-time babysitter for 11-month old in Brooklyn
jobs.description:
ATTENTION: Please apply at https://smartsitting.com/nanny-application or send a childcare resume to recruitment@smartsitting.com

Brooklyn family with an 11-month old seeking a babysitter 3x/week (flexible on which days!). She's a very happy, active baby, with lots of energy! She loves music and being social with other babies. We take her to music classes, story time, art classes and play dates... with other babies in the neighborhood. She is crawling and standing a lot, but not walking yet. She’s loving solid foods, especially fruits, but also still on her bottles 4x a day. Baby is your top priority, but while she’s napping, we appreciate help with light housework, doing laundry once a week, washing the baby’s bottles, changing her sheets on her crib. During nap time, we'd love some help folding their laundry, unloading the dishwasher, wiping them down, and emptying the diaper genie! We are flexible on which days and can add additional hours on some Saturdays if you're available.

Responsibilities

• Light laundry
